Value.label: Locator LED Status
Value.Help: Change the mode of the LED to Status Mode where the LED is illuminated when the load is On, Locator Mode where the LED is illuminated when the Load is Off, or turns off the LED completely for any other setting values.

Value.label: Timeout Duration
Value.Help: Amount of time the light stays on after motion stops

Value.label: Brightness
Value.Help: Valid values are 0-99 or 255 for last dimming level

Value.label: Operation Mode
Value.Help: Motion-sensing mode of operation.

Value.label: Invert Switch
Value.Help: In a three-way configuration, change the top of the add-on switch to OFF and the bottom of the switch to ON, if the switch was installed upside down.

Value.label: Z-Wave Command Dim Step
Value.Help: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

Value.label: Z-Wave Command Dim Rate
Value.Help: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.

Value.label: Local Control Dim Step
Value.Help: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

Value.label: Local Control Dim Rate
Value.Help: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.

Value.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Step
Value.Help: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

Value.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Rate
Value.Help: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.

Value.label: Reset cycle
Value.Help: 0 = disable 1 = 10 seconds 2 = 20 seconds 3 = 30 seconds 4 = 45 seconds ... 110 = 27 minutes 15 seconds

Value.label: Timeout Duration
Value.Help: Amount of time the light stays on after motion stops

Value.label: Brightness
Value.Help: Valid values are 0-99 or 255 for last dimming level

Value.label: Operation Mode
Value.Help: Motion-sensing mode of operation.

Value.label: Invert Switch
Value.Help: In a three-way configuration, change the top of the add-on switch to OFF and the bottom of the switch to ON, if the switch was installed upside down.

Value.label: Reset cycle
Value.Help: 0 = disable 1 = 10 seconds 2 = 20 seconds 3 = 30 seconds 4 = 45 seconds ... 110 = 27 minutes 15 seconds

Value.label: LED Light
Value.Help: When shipped from the factory, the LED is set to turn ON when the connected light is turned OFF. This is the default setting and can be changed if your primary controller supports the node configuration function. To make the LED turn ON when the light is turned ON, change parameter 3s value to 1. To turn the LED OFF at all times, change parameter 3s value to 2.

Item.label: LED Light on when Z-Wave turned OFF
LED Light on when Z-Wave turned ON

Value.label: Operation Mode

Value.label: Invert Switch

Value.label: Reset cycle
Value.Help: 0 = disable 1 = 10 seconds 2 = 20 seconds 3 = 30 seconds 4 = 45 seconds ... 110 = 27 minutes 15 seconds

Value.label: Fade On Time
Value.Help: The amount of time to take to fade the lights from off to on. A value of zero is instant (no fade), values between 1 and 127 represent 1 to 127 seconds, and values from 128 to 253 represent from 1 to 126 minutes.

Value.label: Fade Off Time
Value.Help: The amount of time to take to fade the lights from on to off. A value of zero is instant (no fade), values between 1 and 127 represent 1 to 127 seconds, and values from 128 to 253 represent from 1 to 126 minutes.

Value.label: Minimum Light Level
Value.Help: Smallest dimming value permitted.

Value.label: Maximum Light Level
Value.Help: Largest dimming value permitted.

Value.label: Preset Light Level
Value.Help: The dimming level of the lights when turned from off to on via the switch. If the value of 0 is used, this means the restore dimming to the last dimming value.

Value.label: LED Dim Level Indicator Timeout
Value.Help: The length of time in seconds that the level indicators should stay illuminated after the dimming level is changed. A value of 0 means the indicator is always off, and a value of 255 means the indicators are always on.

Value.label: Locator LED Status
Value.Help: Change the mode of the LED to Status Mode where the LED is illuminated when the load is On, Locator Mode where the LED is illuminated when the Load is Off, or turns off the LED completely for any other setting values.

Value.label: Load Type
Value.Help: Specify the type of load that this dimmer controls.
